description: This table contains the Care Advice (LPA) records given to the Patient in a Call Center call.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the patient call care advice.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date for the encounter in standard date format.

columns.name: CARE_ADVICE_GIVEN
columns.description: The unique ID for the care advice given.

columns.name: CA_GIVEN_DAT
columns.description: The version number of the care advice given.

columns.name: CA_GIVEN_BY
columns.description: The unique ID of the user giving the care advice.

columns.name: CA_GIVEN_DATE
columns.description: The date when the care advice was given.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: CARE_ADVICE_HNO_ID
columns.description: The Note ID that contains the modified care advice.
